# Brilliant Energy Weapon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** 1 melee weapon

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless, object)

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 54

You give a single melee weapon the *[[Brilliant Energy (MagWpnSpcAb)|brilliant energy]]* quality.
